attributes.action: publically justify why the cost of his Sky Sports subscription should be funded from MP allowances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not consider that a subscription to Sky Sports is an expense incurred in accordance with the Green Book Rules.

rejection.details: Petitions to the Number 10 site should request an action that can be taken by the Prime Minister as the head of Government. We suggest you contact Gordon Brown as an MP with your concerns.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
